metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7298 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
query_params.cpp in cxxtools before 2.2.1 allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (infinite recursion and crash) via an HTTP query thatcontains %% (double percent) characters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7298` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcxxtools9v5 - 2.2.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cxxtools package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.1-1').
